A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Might as well rename this \"Star Wars for Millenials: Part 2\". The Force Awakens had very little originality and this film echos that lack of higher brain function.  \"Hey! We're lazy\, throw temper tantrums when we don't get our ways\, we have no originality (so we're going to essentially copy everything that's already been done)\, we have no patience for development and we don't care if there's a side story or two that could actually be interesting and build on the plot.\"  Oh!  And let's kill off any reason for the founding fan base to give two craps about what happens next.  An excellent study on how to make some money on a name and destroy a legacy.
